data.text: To whom dost thou attach thyself, or whom art thou going to assist?
To whom hast thou given counsel? is it not to him who has all wisdom?
To whom hast thou uttered words?
He stretches out the north wind upon nothing,
He keeps back the face of his throne,
He has encompassed the face of the water by an appointed ordinance,
The pillars of heaven are prostrate
He has calmed the sea with his might,
And the barriers of heaven fear him,
Behold, these are parts of his way;
